0,"Desc":"","DefaultValue":"","SaveState":false,"IsInput":false,"IsOutput":false,"ParamName":"","InputParamInfo":null,"OutputParamInfo":null,"TableDef":null,"CustomType":null,"Group":""}],"Steps":[{"StepRunnerKey":"sys:writeClipboard","InputParams":{"type":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"clear"},"successMsg":{"VarKey":null,"Value":""},"stopIfFail":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"1"}},"OutputParams":{"isSuccess":null,"errMessage":null},"IfSteps":null,"ElseSteps":null,"Note":"","Disabled":false,"Collapsed":false,"DelayMs":0},{"StepRunnerKey":"sys:assign","InputParams":{"input":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"C:\Users\19770\OneDrive\Obsidian"},"stopIfFail":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"1"}},"OutputParams":{"isSuccess":null,"output":"ObVaultPath","errMessage":null},"IfSteps":null,"ElseSteps":null,"Note":"Obsidian库的路径，结尾不包含\","Disabled":false,"Collapsed":false,"DelayMs":0},{"StepRunnerKey":"sys:winservice","InputParams":{"operation":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"getRegValue"},"regKeyPath":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment"},"regValueName":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"Temp"},"stopIfFail":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"1"}},"OutputParams":{"isExists":null,"regValue":"TempFilePath"},"IfSteps":null,"ElseSteps":null,"Note":"通过注册表获取Temp文件夹在本地的路径","Disabled":false,"Collapsed":false,"DelayMs":0},{"StepRunnerKey":"sys:officehelper","InputParams":{"operation":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"execVBA"},"appType":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"powerpoint_wpp"},"code":{"VarKey":null,"Value":"Sub ExportSelectionToImageAndCopyToClipboard()
    On Error Resume Next
    Dim tempFilePath As String
    Dim tempShapeName As String
    Dim tempPictureName As String
    Dim tempPPTPageNumName As String
    Dim tempPPTPathName As String
    On Error GoTo 0

    On Error Resume Next
    Dim shapenamePath As String
    Dim picturePath As String
    Dim pptpagenumPath As String
    Dim pptpathPath As String
    On Error GoTo 0

    On Error Resume Next
    Dim pptPath As String
    Dim shapeName As String
    Dim selectedShape As Shape
    Dim slide As slide
    Dim slideIndex As Long
    Dim slideNumber As Long
    Dim fileNumber As Long
    Dim showMessage As Boolean
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 设置临时文件路径和文件名
    On Error Resume Next
    tempFilePath = Environ("TEMP") & "\"
    tempShapeName = "ShapeName.txt"
    tempPictureName = "ExportedPowerPoint.jpg"
    tempPPTPageNumName = "PPTPageNum.txt"
    tempPPTPathName = "PPTPath.txt"
    On Error GoTo 0

    On Error Resume Next
    shapenamePath = tempFilePath & tempShapeName
    picturePath = tempFilePath & tempPictureName
    pptpagenumPath = tempFilePath & tempPPTPageNumName
    pptpathPath = tempFilePath & tempPPTPathName
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 设置为 False 时不显示消息框
    On Error Resume Next
    showMessage = True
    On Error GoTo 0
    
    ' 检查是否选择了一个图形
    On Error Resume Next
    Set selectedShape = ActiveWindow.Selection.ShapeRange(1)
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取当前幻灯片的页数
    On Error Resume Next
    slideNumber = CStr(ActiveWindow.View.Slide.SlideIndex)
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取ppt文件的完整路径
    On Error Resume Next
    pptPath = ActivePresentation.FullName
    On Error GoTo 0

    If Not selectedShape Is Nothing Then
     If showMessage Then
            MsgBox "请截取图片：", vbExclamation
     End If
     ' 导出选中的元素为图片
     On Error Resume Next
     selectedShape.Export picturePath, ppShapeFormatJPG
     ' 获取元素的名称
     shapeName = selectedShape.Name
     ' 取消选中状态
     ActiveWindow.Selection.Unselect
     On Error GoTo 0
    Else
     If showMessage Then
            MsgBox "请截取图片：", vbExclamation
     End If
     ' 获取当前选定的幻灯片索引
     On Error Resume Next
     slideIndex = ActiveWindow.View.Slide.SlideIndex
     ' 选择当前幻灯片
     Set slide = ActivePresentation.Slides(slideIndex)
     ' 导出幻灯片为图片
     slide.Export picturePath, "JPG"
     ' 将元素的名称设置为None
     shapeName = "None"
     On Error GoTo 0
    End If

    ' 获取可用的文件号
    On Error Resume Next
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 将元素的名称写入文本文件
    On Error Resume Next
    Open shapenamePath For Output As #fileNumber
    Print #fileNumber, shapeName
    Close #fileNumber
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取可用的文件号
    On Error Resume Next
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 将幻灯片的页数写入文本文件
    On Error Resume Next
    Open pptpagenumPath For Output As #fileNumber
    Print #fileNumber, slideNumber
    Close #fileNumber
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 获取可用的文件号
    On Error Resume Next
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 将ppt文件的的路径写入文本文件
    On Error Resume Next
    Open pptpathPath For Output As #fileNumber
    Print #fileNumber, pptPath
    Close #fileNumber
    On Error GoTo 0

    ' 释放对象
    On Error Resume Next
    Set selectedShape = Nothing
    Set slide = Nothing
    On Error GoTo 0
End
